samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the Vue multiselect component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source and fetch data from remote data service in the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to group based on the different categories with individual header and icon support using the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the Vue multiselect component pop-up list using the template.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the filtering functionalities works based on the typed characters in the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Custom Value
samples.description: This example demonstrates the addition of a new value that is not present in the predefined list of the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Chip Customization
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of the selected chip element in the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: CheckBox
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to select the multiple values through checkbox in the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Grouping with CheckBox
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to select all the grouped list item values through checkbox in the Vue MultiSelect component.

samples.name: Selection Limit
samples.description: This example demonstrates the maximum selection limit functionalities with checkbox of the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to achieve the diacritics filter functionalities in the Vue multiselect component.

samples.name: Two-way Binding
samples.description: The Vue Multiselect component supports two-way data binding using the v-model attribute of Vue directive. It helps to achieve in sync with data in the DOM.
